sentences.en: He was despondent over the breakup of his marriage.
She was becoming increasingly despondent about the way things were going.
sentences.cn: 她对情况的发展越来越失望。

sentences.en: Joy and sadness are experienced by people in all cultures around the world, but how can we tell when other people are happy or despondent?
sentences.cn: 快乐和悲伤是世界上不同文化的人都会经历的，但我们怎样得知别人是快乐还是沮丧呢？
